```{r load-libraries, include=F}
library(ggplot2)
```

# Example 1

```{r example-syntax-highting}
# Dr Seuss
a <- 1:2
paste(a, "fish", sep ="_")
```

# Example 2

```{r plot-mtcars, fig.align="center", fig.cap="A plot constructed using ggplot2."}
data(mtcars)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(hp,mpg, group = factor(cyl), color = factor(cyl)))
p <- p + geom_point()
p <- p + ggtitle("Mtcars")
p
```
